YardSale

CVS

Design and Reference Manual

YardSale is an open source point of sale program. YardSale uses C++, OTL, and wxWindows. YardSale runs on any system that supports ANSI C++ including, but not limited to, Linux (most architectures), FreeBSD, Microsoft Windows, and Mac OSX.
